ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Survey - System standards and Performance
ygData.msgSnippet: I ll actually respond twice - once for my work machine, once for home. ... Talies the Wanderer (at work)
ygData.messageBody:
I'll actually respond twice - once for my work machine, once for home.

At 10:36 AM 7/26/00 -0500, I wrote:

>Computer Specs for Bards
>
>CPU: P3 450
>RAM: 128 MB
>Video Card (and RAM): PCI Banshee 8MB
>Video Resolution: 800x600
>Sound Card: Built in Blaster-wannabe
>HD speed (rpm): 7200
>'Net speed: T1
>Geographic Location: Houston, TX
>Options enabled or disabled:
> Sky texturing: Double
> Particle Effects: On
> Mip Mapping: Off
>Clip plane distance: Full
>
>How many songs can you twist? 3 max
>Do you slow down when it rains? Yes
>How about in Unrest or Kunark? Less than when it rains, strangely enough

Talies the Wanderer (at work)
